Structs/IGListCollectionScrollingTraits..name: isTracking
Structs/IGListCollectionScrollingTraits..abstract: returns YES if user has touched. may not yet have started dragging.

Structs/IGListCollectionScrollingTraits..name: isDragging
Structs/IGListCollectionScrollingTraits..abstract: returns YES if user has started scrolling. this may require some time and or distance to move to initiate dragging

Structs/IGListCollectionScrollingTraits..name: isDecelerating
Structs/IGListCollectionScrollingTraits..abstract: returns YES if user isn’t dragging (touch up) but scroll view is still moving.

Structs/IGListCollectionScrollingTraits..name: IGListCollectionScrollingTraits
Structs/IGListCollectionScrollingTraits..abstract: The current scrolling traits of the underlying collection view.
